wiki.content: Multi-talented singer/songwriter/producer/musician Bruno Mars swept into the UK chart once again in August 2011 with 'Marry You', a bubbly love song about a couple who go to Las Vegas and spontaneously decide to get married. Following 'Just the Way You Are', 'Grenade' and 'The Lazy Song', 'Marry You' became the fourth huge hit single release from his debut studio album 'Doo-Wops & Hooligans'. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Multi-talented singer/songwriter/producer/musician Bruno Mars swept into the UK chart once again in August 2011 with 'Marry You', a bubbly love song about a couple who go to Las Vegas and spontaneously decide to get married. Following 'Just the Way You Are', 'Grenade' and 'The Lazy Song', 'Marry You' became the fourth huge hit single release from his debut studio album 'Doo-Wops & Hooligans'.
